attributes.action: Immediately publish the 'no deal' Brexit assessment Operation Yellowhammer full.
attributes.additional_details:
The watered down version of Operation Yellowhammer was due to be published on Tuesday 3rd September. According to the Financial Times Michael Gove cancelled publication as even the watered down version was deemed to be to alarming for the public to see. The public have a right to know the likely outcomes of a 'no deal' Brexit so they can prepare themselves and their families as best they can for any negative consequences.

https://www.ft.com/content/c95b92ea-cd90-11e9-99a4-b5ded7a7fe3f
attributes.background: Operation Yellowhammer is the government's own assessment into the likely consequences of a 'no deal' Brexit. Michael Gove ordered it to be rewritten or 'watered down' as it was deemed to be too gloomy.
